Version 2.0

Sep 19, 2019

This major update of Esse brings new functions, new iPad optimized layout and full support of the latest iOS, including new powerful Shortcuts.

  • ğŸˆNew Scratchpad. Transform your text by combining multiple functions at once. Optionally you can save a set of functions as a custom function to use it later.
  • ğŸˆNew shortcuts with natural language style parameters will simplify the use of Esse functions in the Shortcuts app. A brand new â€œTransform Text Fileâ€ shortcut action can apply Esse functions to a text file, stored in iCloud Drive
  • ğŸˆNew iPad optimized interface layout, including new multi column view and context menus
  • ğŸˆNew Count Unique Words function
  • ğŸˆNew Extract Phone Number function
  • ğŸˆNew Extract Email function
  • ğŸˆNew Extract Date function
  • ğŸˆNew Extract Address function
  • ğŸˆNew Chicago Manual of Style capitalization function
  • ğŸˆNew Shuffle Words function
  • ğŸˆNew Shuffle Sentences function
  • ï¸ï¸âš™ï¸Minor Search improvements, now you can search functions not only by name but by description as well
  • ğŸˆSupport for Light and Dark theme, with option to override System appearance
  • ğŸ›Fixed: Custom functions not visible in Share sheet and Today widget

Esse stays free of charge, ads and any kind of tracking. We hope it can make your life a little easier, if you like the app - spread a word.
